name: VR Escape The Puzzle Room
description: This is a fully VR supported puzzle game. There are many interesting puzzles in the room. Find the clue,solve the puzzle one by one, find the way out the room. Many interesting objects are interactive and playable, some of them are useful, while others are just for fun.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows7,windows10 Processor: i5-6300 Memory: 4000 MB RAM Graphics: gtx-970
recommended_requirements: OS: windows7,windows10 Processor: i7-6700 Graphics: gtx-1070
